original: Edlund, John August Olov, kon-traktspro’st, Höckerstad, f. 26/7/94 i Linköp. av Aug. Fredrik E. o. Elin Edlund. G. 27 m. Aiwa Nilsson. Barn: Kierstin f. 28, Karin 30, Gunnar 33. — Stud:ex. i Linköp. 14, teol. fil. ex. 17, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov o. prästv. f. Linköp. stifit 23. V. pastor i Vårdsberg 23, brukspred, i Överum 24-27, kyrkoh. i Ö. Ny sed. 27, kontr:-prost i Vikbolands komtr. sed. 41. Ordf. i skolstyr., kyrkostämma, past:-stämma o. barnav:nd, led. av tax:nd o. komm:fullm.
translated: Edlund, John August Olov, contract priest, Höckerstad, born July 26, 1894 in Linköping, to parents Aug. Fredrik E. and Elin Edlund. Married in 1927 to Aiwa Nilsson with whom he had three children: Kierstin, born in 1928, Karin in 1930, and Gunnar in 1933. He completed his secondary school education in Linköping in 1914, followed by a degree in theology in 1917. He also completed practical theological training and was ordained as a priest in the Linköping diocese in 1923. He worked as a vicar in Vårdsberg in 1923, a chaplain in Överum from 1924 to 1927, and later became a parish priest in Östergötland in 1927. He served as contract priest in Vikboland from 1941. He was the chairman of the school board, church assembly, pastoral meeting, and child welfare committee, and was a member of the tax commission and municipal council.
